RelatedSentence: SHANGHAI , May 19 ( Xinhua ) -- Chinese President Xi Jinping held talks Monday with visiting Kazakh counterpart Nursultan Nazarbayev .

The two presidents exchanged views on China - Kazakhstan relations and international , regional issues of common concern , agreed to enhance bilateral strategic cooperation , safeguard regional security and stability .
During his stay in Shanghai , he will attend the fourth summit of the Conference on Interaction and Confidence Building Measures in Asia ( CICA ) .
Hailing recent achievements of China - Kazakhstan ties , Xi said that mutual political trust and cooperation in various fields have reached an unprecedented high level .
